Hi there!

I am Pre-Doctoral Researcher in University of Alcalá. My background is on Environmental Sciences, with a Masters Degree in Hydrology and Water Resources management. My research field is Hydrological modelling, working with process based models, concretely SWAT+. I have strong programming skills in R, and I like working and exploring data. In my free time I like practising outdoors sports, travel, and enjoy nature.


## Education


PhD in Sciences | University of Alcalá (UAH) | 2020-Present

MSc in Hydrology and Water Resources Management | University of Alcalá (UAH) and King Juan Carlos University (URJC) | 2019-2020

BSc in Environmental Sciences | Autonomous University of Madrid (UAM) | 2015-2019



## Experience

Wengo Analytics | Head Data Scientist | April 2018 - present

GeoScynce | Chief Analyst | Spet 2012 - April 2018
